thread.title: IHOP Is Giving Away Free Pancakes For Charity on Tuesday
thread.title_full: IHOP Is Giving Away Free Pancakes For Charity on Tuesday

author: Aric Jenkins
title: IHOP Is Giving Away Free Pancakes For Charity on Tuesday
text:
The International House of Pancakes is giving customers a chance to put their money where their mouth is.
On Tuesday, IHOP celebrates its annual National Pancake Day with a free short stack for customers from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. Some locations will offer the deal until 10 p.m.
Rather than paying the typical $4.79 for a short stack, IHOP is asking customers to donate to one of its partnered charities instead. The breakfast chain is seeking to raise at least $3.5 million for Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals, Shriners Hospitals for Children, and the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. The proceeds will help children battle critical illnesses, the company said .
This year marks the 12th anniversary of National Pancake Day. Since its inception, IHOP says it has raised over $24 million for charity with the help of its guests.
